toc.title: RAMADDA Downloads
toc.description:
RAMADDA Version %version%

RAMADDA (Repository for Archiving, Managing and Accessing Diverse DAta) is a content management system and publishing platform for Earth Science Data.
Note: These releases are very much alpha and are intended to be used for evaluation purposes. The APIs and the underlying data model may change in the future.

file.name: RAMADDA WAR file
file.description: The WAR file for running under Tomcat or other servlet container

file.name: RAMADDA TAR file
file.description: This file allows you to run RAMADDA as a stand-alone server and to run the command line publishing clients.

file.name: Repository Source Release
file.description: Contains the source code for RAMADDA. See README in org/ramadda/repository.
